text: APA Insurance Limited is a composite (general, life, health) insurance company licensed by Insurance Regulatory Authority (IRA) Kenya under reference IRA/05/001/2025. Headquarters: Apollo Centre, 7 Ring Road Parklands, Westlands, P.O. Box 30065-00100, Nairobi, Kenya. Website: https://www.apainsurance.org. Customer rating: Mixed customer feedback; positive for digital services, some delays in complex claims, Claims settlement ratio: Not publicly available for 2024; recognized for reliable settlements (Most Convenient General Insurance Provider 2025).

text: Motor Private Insurance (ID: apa_motor_private_001) is a general / personal insurance / motor insurance product by apa_001 for private car owners. Geographic coverage: Kenya (extendable to East Africa).
Exclusions for Motor Private Insurance (ID: apa_motor_private_001): ['Unlicensed drivers', 'Drunk driving', 'Wear and tear', 'Political violence (optional add-on)'].
Add-ons for Motor Private Insurance (ID: apa_motor_private_001): ['Roadside assistance', 'Political violence', 'Windscreen cover'].
